front.title: An efficient method to publish ranges of IP addresses in the DNS

abstract.t: The DNS has long been used to publish lists of IPv4 address ranges inblacklists and whitelists. The size of the IPv6 address space makesthe entry-per-IP approach used for IPv4 lists impractical. A newtechnique for publishing IP address ranges is described. It isintended to permit efficient publishing and querying, and to havegood DNS cache behavior.
